channel.description: Learn how to get a free astrology chart. Friends and Lovers, Past Lives, Birth Chart, ChildStar and a 12 month forecast. Handcrafted Essential oil blends to treat conditions of Mind, Body and Spirit. Interview with a Ghost Whisperer and other podcasts discussing New Age topics. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: EPISODE27 - A Soul's Sacrifice and the Afterlife
item.author: isisdivining@yahoo.com
item.description: This is Part 2 of the Reincarnation podcast. Take comfort in the possibility that ourselves and our loved ones who suffer from disabilities, suffering, or early death in their lives are serving a higher purpose. "Why do Bad Things happen to Good People"? We'll try to answer that age-old question.
item.itunes:author: Maureen
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE27 - A Soul's Sacrifice and the Afterlife
item.itunes:summary: This is Part 2 of the Reincarnation podcast. item.itunes:keywords: free astrology charts, ghostwhisperer, medium, spirit guides, aromatherapy

item.title: EPISODE26 - Reincarnation
item.author: isisdivining@yahoo.com
item.description: Explore the possibility that we don't live only once, that our hardships and joys are the results of past lives and that we alone choose the qualities of our future lives through our own free will, and not from the manipulation of a higher power.
item.itunes:author: Maureen
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE26 - Reincarnation
item.itunes:summary: Explore the possibility that we don't live only once, that our hardships and joys are the results of past lives and that we alone choose the qualities of our future lives through our own free will, and not from the manipulation of a higher power.
